comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13

When I dragged an image into Photoshop, PS froze. Finnaly it processed the image and all is ok.
Next time I click and drag another unrelated image, on another website, after 30 minutes,  the "preview" (semi-transparent image following mouse ) is of the first image drag, not the current one. Stop dragging, click and drag again, correct image.



Reproducible: Couldn't Reproduce




I have no idea how or if it's reproducible.
